slide.title: Boxes
slide.blurb: A more sophisticated container is a ~box~. It allows you to place, or ~pack~, more than one widget inside a simple container. There are horizontal (*GtkHBox*) and vertical (*GtkVBox*) boxes that pack their widgets correspondingly. First, create a new box:
Then place some widgets into it using either %pack_start()% method (packs left-to-right for HBox and top-to-bottom for VBox) or %pack_end()% method (vice versa).
You can nest the boxes to any degree, thus creating complex containment patterns.
